name: wasm-benchmark
description: WebAssembly Performance Benchmark: Rust vs TinyGo Comparison

scripts.test: WASM_BENCH_TEST_LEVEL=full vitest run tests --reporter=verbose --testTimeout=300000 && node tests/utils/prettify-test-results.js
scripts.test:smoke: WASM_BENCH_TEST_LEVEL=smoke vitest run tests/unit tests/integration/cross-language.test.js --testTimeout=10000 && node tests/utils/prettify-test-results.js
scripts.test:unit: WASM_BENCH_TEST_LEVEL=unit vitest run tests/unit --reporter=verbose --testTimeout=5000 && node tests/utils/prettify-test-results.js
scripts.test:integration: WASM_BENCH_TEST_LEVEL=integration vitest run tests/integration --reporter=verbose --testTimeout=60000 && node tests/utils/prettify-test-results.js

author: Xingxing Wang
